mods.abstract: North oriented. Field notes on right-hand portion of map: 'Field Notes of Survey of Government Grounds attached to the U.S. Garrison at Baton Rouge La.' Signed by 'Henry & Wm G. Waller, Survs. & Civ. Engr, Baton Rouge, La.' Note at bottom center of map: 'A true copy from the original on file in our office, (signed) Henry & William G. Waller.'
mods.accessCondition: Please submit an LSU Special Collections reference ticket at https://askus.lib.lsu.edu/special for any questions or comments about this digital object.

Access to unprocessed collections requires the permission of the curator, subject to Special Collectionsâ€™ Policy on Access to Unprocessed Collections (http://www.lib.lsu.edu/special/about/unprocessed.html)
mods.note: William Waller Survey Collection, Mss. 3592, 3910, 4326, Louisiana and Lower Mississippi Valley Collections, LSU Libraries, Baton Rouge, La.
